name: Run Cherry Run!
description:
Run Cherry Run! Description:

A simple endless running game like the google dinosaur's game, try to make your own record! 

Thank you very much to everyone who will try the game. Please if you have any advice leave a comment, and if you are interested to my next works, follow me!

Credits: 

Thanks to www.dl-sounds.com for the sounds of this game. 

All in-game assets, except for the audio assets, are realized by me Stext25.
